text: (nabiye!) manakkalpitava allah mata boru gota kiyannanta vada, nætahot vahi magin ohuta kisivak dænum nodi tibiyadi “matat vahi pahala viya” yayi pavasannata vada, nætahot “allah pahala kala me(ma dharma)ya vænnak mamat pahala karannemi” yayi pavasannata vada aparadhakaraya kavarekda? mema aparadhakarayin marana mamcakayehi sitina avasthavedi oba ovunva dakinnehi nam, malayikavarun tamange at digu kara, (ovunta) “obage pana laba denu. ada dina avaman gena dena danduvamama obata phalavipaka vasayen denu labanu æta. oba satyaya novana dæya allah kerehi (boru) kiya ohuge ayavanda u~gukama magin oba pratiksepa kirimama meyata hetu ve” (yayi pavasanu oba dakinnehiya)
